releaseNotes:
Complete Rebuild for Modern Devices: After years of delighting babies and toddlers worldwide, Peekaboo Wild receives its most comprehensive update ever—completely rebuilt for today's devices while preserving every gentle interaction that has made it a trusted first app for the youngest learners.

Enhanced Performance: This technical reconstruction ensures Peekaboo Wild will continue serving families and early childhood programs reliably. The same beloved animal discovery experience now runs smoothly on current tablets and smartphones with improved stability and responsiveness.
Optimized for Little Hands: Better touch responsiveness and refined animation timing create more intuitive interactions for babies and toddlers. The app now responds more consistently to small finger taps while maintaining the gentle, predictable pace that keeps young children engaged without overstimulation.

Improved Reliability: Comprehensive bug fixes eliminate crashes and freezing that can frustrate both children and caregivers. Faster launch times and smoother performance ensure consistent play experiences during those precious moments when a calm, engaging activity is needed most.
Future-Ready Technology: Updated for compatibility with the latest operating systems and devices commonly used in homes, daycares, and early intervention settings. Enhanced memory management provides stable performance even during extended play sessions.
Continued Safety Standards: Backed by Peekaboo Interactive Games, an independent, woman-led design studio committed to safe digital experiences for young children. This update maintains our commitment to ad-free, data-safe environments that give parents peace of mind.
Still Trusted and Safe: Fully COPPA-compliant, completely offline, zero in-app purchases, no subscriptions, and no data collection. Simple, gentle technology designed for babies and toddlers as their introduction to the digital world.
description:
Extend the magic of peekaboo play worldwide with Peekaboo Wild—the COPPA-compliant, ad-free animal discovery app trusted by families and early childhood programs. This interactive picture book brings wildlife from around the globe to toddlers and babies, transforming simple cause-and-effect learning into delightful moments of surprise and recognition.

Perfect for Early Development (Ages 0-4): Peekaboo Wild supports fundamental learning milestones through engaging animal recognition activities. Babies develop visual tracking and object permanence, while toddlers build vocabulary, animal identification skills, and cause-and-effect understanding. Each habitat tap reveals friendly animals and their babies, reinforcing the predictable interaction patterns that comfort and engage young minds.

Designed for Special Needs Support: The consistent tap-and-discover format provides structure and predictability perfect for children with autism spectrum disorders, developmental delays, or sensory processing needs. Clear visual cues and gentle animations create a calming, non-overwhelming experience that encourages exploration and learning at each child's own pace.

Simple Language Learning: Multi-language options and authentic animal sounds support vocabulary development for ESL families and multilingual households. The straightforward format makes it ideal for introducing animal names and sounds in multiple languages while building early phonemic awareness.

Created by Brianne Baker: Every charming animal springs from the imagination of renowned children's artist Brianne Baker, whose distinctive illustrations have delighted families for over a generation. Developed by Peekaboo Interactive Games, an independent, woman-led design studio specializing in thoughtful apps for the youngest learners.

Safe Digital Experience: Completely offline with zero data collection, no advertisements, no in-app purchases, and no tracking. Fully COPPA-compliant design ensures pure, distraction-free play perfect for babies and toddlers who need gentle, predictable digital experiences.
Perfect for: Early intervention programs, speech therapy sessions, quiet time activities, travel entertainment, sensory breaks, and introducing babies to their first interactive digital experience.

For our full privacy policy, see https://www.bighappyholding.com/privacy-policy

QUESTIONS OR CONCERNS?
Please visit our support page at support@peekaboointeractive.com before posting a review. We appreciate the opportunity to troubleshoot for you!
